item.title: StudyTub-One stop for all the notes.
item.description: ðŸŒŸ What is Study Tub? Link to heading Study Tub is the place to get overall Bachelor of Technology notes. You can also add your notes and lab materials over here. That will allow everyone to improve their practical skills and theoretical knowledge. ðŸš€ðŸš€ Inspiration Link to heading Due to this covid pandemic, we’re unable to have physical classes resulting in a shortage of good notes.
